messages.content: I have lived in this area all my life and I am active in my community raising awareness of wellbeing and giving advice to residents.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Raising awareness of wellbeing and giving advice to residents to improve quality of life.

Addressing issues such as poor health, pollution, crime, cuts to youth services and lack of affordable housing which affect the quality of life of all residents in Brent especially the next generation.
Concerned about the future generations who have to pay for their education and those who can't afford to buy a house and suffer from high rents.

Working with different groups such as young people, elders and people with disabilities has provided a deep understanding of the impact cuts to funding has on the quality of life for the most vulnerable in society.

issues.education: Concerns about the generation who have to pay for their education and high rents.
issues.health: Mentions poor health as an issue.

housing.content: Issues such as lack of affordable housing affecting quality of life for residents in Brent, especially the next generation.

leaflet.personalStatement: My daily life working with different groups such as young people, elders and people with disabilities has allowed me to gain a deep understanding of the impact cuts to funding has had on the quality of life for the most vulnerable in society. This awareness has motivated me into action.

images.caption: Image of John Mansook with the text 'Vote' and political campaign messages.

leaflet.additionalNotes: "Greens offer a compassionate alternative, I will stand up for Hampstead & Kilburn."
